extendedInfo.description: Itâs the worldâs oldest question: Whatâs for dinner? Campbellâs Kitchen for Android has the answer â plenty of answers, in fact. With thousands of delicious, nutritious â and free! â recipes, Campbellâs Kitchen is always at your side with terrific suggestions for meals â whether youâre planning the weekâs groceries or just need some quick ideas for tonight. Fun to use â with gorgeous food photography and easy step-by-step preparation instructions â Campbellâs Kitchen for Android lets you:â¢	Find recipes by keyword or just browsing. â¢	Scan the UPC symbol on any Campbellâs product package and see what recipes come up.â¢	Get surprising suggestions in a nanosecond with the Quick Ideas shaker.â¢	Save and organize recipes in your Recipe Box â it automatically synchronizes with your CampbellsKitchen.com account!â¢	Share recipes via email or Facebook.â¢	Use Dinner Vote to send options to your family and let them choose.â¢	Effortlessly create a shopping list â then send it to your spouse.Campbellâs Kitchen is a trusted name in recipes, cooking solutions and tips for eating smart as well as savings suggestions to help you make the most of your meals. Our goal is to provide great recipes from great brands, inspire with fresh ideas and offer helpful tools for all your food needs. Whether youâre solving a dinner dilemma, planning the perfect party or standing in the grocery aisle looking for inspiration, Campbellâs Kitchen for Android is your anytime, anywhere, go-to resource. Download it for free â we look forward to cooking with you!

reviews.title: Good and bad
reviews.comment: Great concept great recipes only bad is it force closes on HTC EVO 4G. I just find recipes I like on mobile app and find on website. Please fix force close please then I will give 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Error remains - do not install
reviews.comment: Current version of app has lost feature of looking up recipes - 404 server not found. So far developers unresponsive to previous complaints so DO NOT INSTALL until fixed (can\'t use large portion of app, so why bother?)
reviews.author: anne skenzich

reviews.title: Needs fixing
reviews.comment: I love how i can use this app while im shopping but i can\'t login to view or save anything so i have to constantly keep searching for the same thing to view it more than once...fix the issue and ill change my rating
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uninstalled
reviews.comment: I have been using this app for about a year, but recent updates made it so you can\'t save recipes.After uninstalling and reinstalling, it keeps telling me there are no recipes to display and a remote server error (404). If the problems are fixed, I will reinstall.
reviews.author: Ann Chestnut

reviews.title: Needs to be fixed!
reviews.comment: Great ideas but it keeps force closing and will not let me log on so I can\'t save any recipes. So don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Grrr
reviews.comment: All it does is force close!!! Could be a great app, but judging from older comments, nobody cares to fix it. Uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Still loading
reviews.comment: Had issues with this app on my thunderbolt. Now I have a DROID razor maxx and try to open the app and nothing but loading! This would be great to have to get my saved recipes but just won\'t work.
reviews.author: Rachel Pittner

reviews.title: Months and still crashes
reviews.comment: Take this off the market till you get the Andoid version fixed. Just angers people which will result in few coming back, including me
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its okay....
reviews.comment: The recipe of the week has been the same thing for 2 months!!! Overall its a good app I love how I can check the ingredients i need and look at them while I shop!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: No problem setting up an account, the app is nice and easy to use, great recipes, easy to save and overall a great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: New issues
reviews.comment: Since everything updated my recipe of the day is gone along with the other suggestions that are supposed to be on the home screen. Please, please fix! I love this app when it was working!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So Sad :(
reviews.comment: I just reinstalled this app after nor having it for awhile and now all it does is force close. I see everyone is having that problem. So why hasn\'t it been fixed?? I use to LOVE this app and used it all the time. Now its useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thought it would be cool
reviews.comment: But was disappointed at how many errors and force closes there are.  Fix please I love the way this is setup
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use to love this app when I had my Iphone
reviews.comment: I have had nothing but trouble with this app since I got my android. I would always use this app but since the switch I can\'t save recipes, closes it\'s itself and the recipe of the day does not change anymore. Please fix it. I love the recipes just can\'t save them anymore. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was good
reviews.comment: Then was horrible and now is working great on my phone and very well organized too. Lets hope it stays this way
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: I can\'t add recipes to my box because it says they can be decrypted. Please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I really want to give 5 stars, but...
reviews.comment: I\'m unable to log in to my account. This app worked perfectly when I had the Samsung Epic, but now that I\'ve updated to the Galaxy Note 2, I no longer can use the features that you have to be logged in to use.  I can enter my email and password. But when I click Log In, nothing happens.  Please fix.
reviews.author: Erin Connors

reviews.comment: Would be awesome but force closes on the Android OS. However it works wonderfully on my friends iPhone. Recommend downloading only if you have one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Keeps telling me there\'s something wrong with the server :(
reviews.author: margaret panayiotou

reviews.title: Pretty good but not able to Sync
reviews.comment: Works okay as a stand alone application but is NOT able to sync with their web site. I simply get a \'404 error server not found\' error whether on Wifi or Cellular connectivity. Fix this and I will be happy.
reviews.author: A Google User
